## QNCameraVideoTrack.setVideoOrientation() method

设置 camera 时的采集摄像头的旋转方向

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setVideoOrientation(videoOrientation: QNAVCaptureVideoOrientation): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  videoOrientation | [QNAVCaptureVideoOrientation](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnavcapturevideoorientation.md) | 旋转方向 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

只支持ios，默认 AVCaptureVideoOrientationPortrait
